mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM T_TAG_REFER WHERE TAG_ID = #{tagId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_TAG_REFER (ID, REFER_ID, TAG_ID, IS_SHOW, TYPE) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{referId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tagId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isShow,jdbcType=BIT}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT TT.NAME FROM T_TAG_REFER TTR LEFT JOIN T_TAG TT ON TT.ID = TTR.TAG_ID WHERE TTR.REFER_ID = #{referId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT TT.NAME, COUNT(TTR.TAG_ID) AS CNT FROM T_TAG_REFER TTR LEFT JOIN T_TAG TT ON TT.ID = TTR.TAG_ID GROUP BY TTR.TAG_ID ORDER BY CNT DESC LIMIT 30
